title: ‘All Options Are Open’: Out-of-Contract Jasper Philipsen Kick-Starts Peloton’s Chase for Tour de France Spring King
content:
Is Philipsen set to leave the Alpecin-Deceuninck team that took him to the top? UAE Emirates and Bora-Hansgrohe sniff at super-speedster's signature.

Read the full article at ‘All Options Are Open’: Out-of-Contract Jasper Philipsen Kick-Starts Peloton’s Chase for Tour de France Spring King on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
